'''Radiant Spincrystal 3''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Lone Sojourner]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located in a wooden cart behind the sign across [[Tunner]] outside of the [[Dawn Winery Manor]].
